Class FileManager

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.utils.FileManager
public class FileManager extends Object
Utility class for file operations in the BTO Management System. This class handles reading from and writing to CSV files for various entities, including users, projects, enquiries, and applications.

      public FileManager()

  • Method Details

    • ensureDataDirectoryExists

      public static boolean ensureDataDirectoryExists()
      Ensures that the data directory exists, creating it if necessary. This method should be called before any file operations.
      Returns:
      true if the directory exists or was created successfully, false otherwise

    • loadUsersFromCSV

      public static List<User> loadUsersFromCSV(String filePath, String role)
      Loads users (Applicant, Officer, Manager) from their respective CSV files.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the CSV file
      role - the role of the users to load (e.g., "Applicant", "HDBOfficer", "HDBManager")
      Returns:
      a list of users of the specified role

    • loadProjectsFromCSV

      public static List<Project> loadProjectsFromCSV(String filePath)
      Loads all projects from the specified CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the CSV file
      Returns:
      a list of projects

    • saveProjects

      public static boolean saveProjects(List<Project> projects)
      Saves a list of projects to the project CSV file.
      Parameters:
      projects - the list of projects to save
      Returns:
      true if the projects were saved successfully, false otherwise

    • addOfficerRegistration

      public static boolean addOfficerRegistration(String officerNric, int projectId)
      Adds an officer registration for a project.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - the NRIC of the officer
      projectId - the ID of the project
      Returns:
      true if the registration was added successfully, false otherwise

    • loadAllEnquiries

      public static List<Enquiry> loadAllEnquiries(String filePath)
      Loads all enquiries from the specified CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the CSV file
      Returns:
      a list of enquiries

    • updateEnquiryResponse

      public static boolean updateEnquiryResponse(Enquiry enquiry)
      Updates the response for an enquiry in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry with the updated response
      Returns:
      true if the response was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • updatePasswordInCSV

      public static boolean updatePasswordInCSV(String filePath, String nric, String newPassword)
      Updates a user's password in the specified CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the CSV file
      nric - the NRIC of the user
      newPassword - the new password
      Returns:
      true if the password was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • applicantNricExists

      public static boolean applicantNricExists(String nric)
      Checks if an applicant with the specified NRIC exists in the applicant CSV file.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC to check
      Returns:
      true if an applicant with the specified NRIC exists, false otherwise

    • updateApplicantApplication

      public static boolean updateApplicantApplication(Applicant applicant)
      Updates an applicant's application details (applied project, status, and flat type) in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant with the updated application details
      Returns:
      true if the application details were updated successfully, false otherwise

    • saveAllEnquiries

      public static boolean saveAllEnquiries(List<Enquiry> list)
      Saves a list of enquiries to the enquiry CSV file.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of enquiries to save
      Returns:
      true if the enquiries were saved successfully, false otherwise

    • getBookedUnits

      public static int getBookedUnits(int projectId, String flatType)
      Gets the number of booked units for a specific project and flat type.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project
      flatType - the flat type
      Returns:
      the number of booked units
